description: Detects static QMS 810 and mimikatz driver name used by Mimikatz as exploited in CVE-2021-1675 and CVE-2021-34527
author: Markus Neis
@markus_neis
Florian Roth
false_positives: Legitimate installation of printer driver QMS 810, Texas Instruments microLaser printer (unlikely)
name: PrinterNightmare Mimikatz Driver Name
query: ((((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\\\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Nn][Vv][Ii][Rr][Oo][Nn][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Xx]64\\\\[Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\\\[Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\-3\\\\[Qq][Mm][Ss]\ 810\\\\.*/ OR /.*\\\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\\\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Nn][Vv][Ii][Rr][Oo][Nn][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Xx]64\\\\[Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\\\[Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\-3\\\\[Mm][Ii][Mm][Ii][Kk][Aa][Tt][Zz].*/)) OR ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*legitprinter* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\\\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Nn][Vv][Ii][Rr][Oo][Nn][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss].*/)))) OR ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\\\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Nn][Vv][Ii][Rr][Oo][Nn][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/) AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*[Gg][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ii][Ll]\ [Kk][Ii][Ww][Ii].*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ii][Mm][Ii][Kk][Aa][Tt][Zz]\ [Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*[Kk][Ii][Ww][Ii]\ [Ll][Ee][Gg][Ii][Tt]\ [Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr].*/))))
